definitions: a person or team that qualifies for a competition or its final rounds

examples.text: he is now 14 and trying to become the youngest qualifier for a PGA Tour event

shortDefinitions: person or team that qualifies for competition or its final rounds

definitions: a match or contest to decide which individuals or teams qualify for a competition or its final rounds
shortDefinitions: match or contest to decide which individuals or teams qualify for competition

definitions: a word or phrase, especially an adjective, used to attribute a quality to another word, especially a noun.
shortDefinitions: word used to attribute quality to another word

definitions: (in systemic grammar) a word or phrase added after a noun to qualify its meaning.
shortDefinitions: (in systemic grammar) word or phrase added after noun to qualify its meaning
